name: DISCOCUBE
description:
Hi everybody! We made it! This puzzle game is about the cube at disco. Try to pass 10 levels. Huge love to cubes, disco and games helped us to invent and create this game. Thank you for your attention. Enjoy the game. Hope you will like to play it as we do. Description. Help the cube to collect all the balls. Good luck!

Controls: w, a, s, d and arrows
